name: Cube Corp.
description:
Game made for the Mini Jam 110! 
This is a short (5-10 minutes) platform-puzzle game where you need to sacrifice yourself and use your corpse to escape the level.

Controls:

WASD / Left Stick : Move.

Space / Button A : Jump.

R / Button X : Sacrifice yourself!

This is my first game jam and my first serious game made in Unity, please enjoy!


-Credits
Sound effects from www.zapsplat.com.
Music by RobyJ.
